title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.5 - Sales
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.5 - Sales

State Regulations
A central record must be maintained which shall show the
daily sales of alcoholic beverages and food, separately stated for each of the
several separately licensed premises. Such record shall reflect the
following: (a) total daily
receipts; (b) daily income from
alcoholic beverages; (c) daily
income from food; (d) miscellaneous
income. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
69.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
